name: StatusCake
author: log.OSCON, Lda.

sections.description:
StatusCake is a website uptime monitoring and alerts service. StatusCake is an ideal companion to your WordPress website that features rich uptime monitoring, domain monitoring, SSL monitoring and a whole lot more.

This plugin allows you to easily integrate StatusCake into your WordPress website.

Usage

Navigate to the ‘StatusCake’ settings page under the Settings menu.
sections.installation:
Dashboard

  1. Go to the ‘Plugins’ menu, and choose ‘Add New’.
  2. Search for ‘wpstatuscake’, and then click ‘Install Now’.
  3. Click ‘Activate’.

FTP

  1. Download and extract the .zip file.
  2. Upload the unzipped folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu.

Composer

composer require logoscon/wpstatuscake
sections.faq:
Where can I report bugs?

Bugs can be reported on the GitHub repository.

How can I contribute?

Join in on our GitHub repository and read our contribution guidelines.
